sql.describ: 根据人员身份代码获取人员基本信息

sqlfile.sql: select a.dlzh_dm,a.dlzhkl,a.swry_dm, b.swryxm, b.sfzjhm, b.xb_dm, b.zw, c.swrysf_dm, c.rysfmc from QX_DLZHXX a, DM_GY_SWRY b, DM_QX_SWRYSF c where a.swry_dm = b.swry_dm and b.swry_dm = c.swry_dm and a.yxbz='Y' and b.yxbz='Y' and c.yxbz='Y' and c.swrysf_dm = ?

sql.describ: 根据人员代码和身份代码查询人员基本信息

sqlfile.sql: select a.dlzh_dm,a.dlzhkl,a.swry_dm userid, b.swryxm, b.sfzjhm, b.xb_dm, b.zw, c.swrysf_dm, c.rysfmc,jg.swjg_dm swrysfjg,jg.swjgmc from QX_DLZHXX a, DM_GY_SWRY b, DM_QX_SWRYSF c ,dm_gy_swjg jg where a.swry_dm = b.swry_dm and b.swry_dm = c.swry_dm and c.sfswjg_dm=jg.swjg_dm and a.yxbz='Y' and b.yxbz='Y' and c.yxbz='Y' and a.swry_dm=? and c.swrysf_dm = ?
